subtitleNullable: Labelled Images of Indian Cricket Players
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Few days ago I created a [Cricket Players Faces](https://www.kaggle.com/omkarjc27/cricket-players-faces) dataset and I wanted to develop an image classification model using it. But the problem was, there were some players who did not have a lot of images which resulted in low accuracy of the model. So this dataset has a lot of images of just Indian cricketer's. 

### Content

Below are around 600 images of 15 top Indian cricket players (who have participated in the 2019 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup). There are 30-50 images per player.

### Acknowledgements

I have scrapped all these images from google images using a selenium and beautiful-soup and cleaned them out, image by image. I am Sorry but I can't give credit to the owners. I am Sorry, Really Really SORRY.

### Inspiration

It would be fun to find everyone's cricketer doppelganger.
title: Indian Cricketer's Images

But the problem was, there were some players who did not have a lot of images which resulted in low accuracy of the model. So this dataset has a lot of images of just Indian cricketer's. 

### Content

Below are around 600 images of 15 top Indian cricket players (who have participated in the 2019 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup). There are 30-50 images per player.

### Acknowledgements

I have scrapped all these images from google images using a selenium and beautiful-soup and cleaned them out, image by image. I am Sorry but I can't give credit to the owners. I am Sorry, Really Really SORRY.
